name: Real Estate SPA
description: Single Page Aplication of a Real Estate business minified with Webpack and transpiled with Babel for browser compatibility. It manages states to present the business projects and trajectory, built using the design system mobile-first to smooth the responsive design.

name: Admin E-commerce
description: E-commerce admin page, this project has a dashboard, and it is a CRUD to manage the e-commerce build with React and Next. It authorizes registered users to access the console.I built the interface with Tailwind UI to focus the development on functionality. The CRUD manager uses this API.

name: E-commerce React
description: E-commerce made with React JS, minified with Webpack, and transpiled with Babel for browser compatibility. In this project, I learned how state and context work to manage my components and send information across them. Products were requested from this API.

name: E-commerce Next
description: E-commerce migrated from a React JS project to Next JS. Performance and SEO improved with Server-Side-Rendering. Using Next the project can run faster, and it deals with the SEO issues of React JS.

name: Pokedex
description: Pokedex built using the Poke API. You can see every pokemon of each region, and filter them by type, see pokemon stats and their evolutions. Also, you can check the moves and see what pokemon can learn it. It uses the native fetch method to make asynchronous requests to the API.

name: Batata Bit Landing Page
description: Landing Page of a crypto exchange, built using the design system mobile-first, using a design from Figma. The project's layout is made with CSS Grid.

name: Restaurant Landing Page
description: Layout created with CSS Grid to make simple and smooth transitions through different screen sizes. Built thinking on responsive design.
